titleStmt.title: The golden booke of the leaden goddes Wherein is described the vayne imaginations of heathe[n] pagans, and counterfaict Christians: wyth a description of their seueral tables, what ech of their pictures signified. By Stephen Batman, student in diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Batman, Stephen, d. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreete, neare vnto Saynct Dunstanes Churche, by Thomas Marshe],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Running title reads: The golden booke of the leaden gods.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
